definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[שׂוֹרָה]] Is 28:5 prob. dittogr. for foll. [[שְׂעׂרָה]] (Koppe We Che al.; LXX SyrVer om.); > Vulgate Ges Di al. in rows (adv. acc; but NH [[שׁוּרָה]], Ar. suwrun, Lag:GGN 1889, 298; cf. Vogelst:Landwirthsch. 41 who favours ´[[שׁ]]: in Is. More plausible would be some grain, as [[שורה]] Zinj. Inscr., Lzb:374 Sachau:Panammu 23).
